Title: Heist School
Writer: Kevin Etten, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam Devine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dave King (staff writer)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam Devine, Anders Holm, John Farley
Plot: When something they love is taken from them, the guys go undercover at a high school to investigate.
